===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# stem of the Manchurian aristolochia, {{taxlink|Aristolochia manshuriensis|species|noshow=1}} (An [[herb]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to improve cardiac function and alleviate joint-pain.)

* {{l|zh|利湿药}} ''("dampness-eliminating" herbs )''
